Question: From 2000 – 2006, this person served as chairman of the board of trustees of Eisenhower Fellowships.
Hints: This person has shied away from mainstream media and cable talk shows.
This person was born Heinz Alfred **** in Fürth, Bavaria, Germany, in 1923 during the Weimar Republic, to a family of German Jews.
Since his childhood, this person has been a fan of his hometown's soccer club, SpVgg Greuther Fürth.
